p: Person correlation ( r) indicated that there was non-significant negative correlation between MIC and antibiofilm of both R. officinalis ( r = −0.08, p > 0.05) and T. zygis ( r = −0.04, p > 0.05), however, there was a non-significant positive correlation between MIC and biofilm of O. majorana ( r = −0.129, p > 0.05).
